nodes.text: The Altano Trade Route was a hyperspace route. At some point between 4 and 5 ABY, a human and a Weequay criminal made plans to ambush Imperial convoys at a point along the trade route while they were drinking at the castle of the pirate Maz Kanata on the planet Takodana.
The Altano Trade Route was first mentioned in the 2017 video game Star Wars: Battlefront II.
